item.title: 50 Cent to Host True Crime Series for Fox Nation
item.description: The multi-hyphenate will host and produce ‘50 Ways to Catch a Killer’ for the Fox News streaming service.

item.title: Fox Nation Acquires TV Rights to Hulk Hogan and Eric Bischoff’s New Wrestling League
item.description: Of course Real American Freestyle ended up on the Fox News streaming platform.

item.title: Sean Hannity Sets ‘Wanted’ Series at Fox Nation as Streamer Goes West (Exclusive)
item.description: Hannity will front ‘Wanted: Dead or Alive,’ a new series that joins a growing lineup of Western-themed programming at the Fox News streaming service.
